message: Let's divide fairly, considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more
I understand the inflation puts you at a disadvantage, but your initial offer was too low for me. Let's meet closer to the middle.
Considering the increasing inflation impact on me, I'm willing to adjust slightly but still need a bit more
Alice, this is my final offer. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  The inflation is hurting you more than me, so take this deal before it's too late for both of us.
